ants.tasks
Class BaseTask

java.lang.Object
  ants.tasks.BaseTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
Task
Direct Known Subclasses:
AttackHillsTask, ClearHillTask, ClusteringTask, CombatTask, DefendAreaTask, ExploreTask, FollowTask, GatherFoodTask, MissionTask, ValidateOrdersTask
public abstract class BaseTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements Task

Base implementation of a Task, mainly so Tasks that have no need for a setup method don't need to implement it.

Author:
kases1,kustl1
